Articles.Content:
Hi i'm new to kerbal space program and admitted to play it today but sadly the game will begin to load and then becomes unresponsive i purchased the game through steam but sadly cant get it to load to actually play it which is really disappointing here are my PC specs

AMD A4-3300 APU 8GB (3.49GB usable) RAM and a NVID GeForce GT710 graphics card 

any help would be appreciated thanks
Is it stuck on asset bundle definitions? if so, just wait for it to load.
It stops responding when you have the small symbol in the bottom right concer that's got loading next to it I left it on for about 30 minutes and still didn't load

Please send us a dxdiag report to [email protected] so we can help you, this is how you can get one:
http://www.matrixgames.com/forums/tm.asp?m=1597548
For Mac, click the Apple logo on the top left, select About This Mac, click the System Report button and hit cmd+S.
For Linux, a dump of the hwinfo on the console will do.

Also send us your log file, KSP.log located in your KSP installation folder.

 

If you already sent the email we will get back to you soon!
It might be an RAM issue? 4GB is pretty small...

22 minutes ago, AwesomeDude3664 said:

It might be an RAM issue? 4GB is pretty small...

Nah, i run 4GB on a Celeron stock(including my planet pack) and it's slow, but doable.

 

The infinite loading screen is annoying, you might try re-installing the game as you have it via Steam. Let me know how that goes.
